Name: Shameer S
Title: Must visit Anandi Magic world. Lucknow.
Review: We visited there Anandi Magic world property and it is awesome. Worth each penny. Excellent room service. Good rooms. Good food. Good rides. Waiters were prompt. Overall loved my exp.

Name: Tanvi
Title: Enjoyed at water park
Review: There were good rides enjoyed here . Water park charges are normal . My kids played a lot and we're very happy .

Name: Harshit
Title: Just okay.
Review: Price in my opinion is little high from what service and facilities it provides.Few rides are available and is most crowded on weekends.

Name: Mukesh Srivastava
Title: Expensive and poorly maintained resort
Review: I visited anandi water park today.The turn for the resort is not marked prominently. If you are coming from BBD side,  u have to take a turn immediately after crossing the canal,  cross it again and take left turn,  the road is almost a service road adjacent to the canals and has different coloured flag all along till the resort. For a weekday the entry was for 700 rs for adults. Lunch was an addon for 150 rs, which we didn't opt for. The guy at the reception offered us private changing rooms for additional amount which we declined, a decision we regretted. The entry amount included one small cold drink,  a small cup of ice cream and one snack with choice between pav bhaji and noodles. The management dies not allow outside Food and your bag is checked. Food offered was of average quality. The pool and the slides are good and continuous DJ plays on quite loudly,  we enjoyed this part. The sour point were the changing rooms which were actually filthy,  cubicle doors were broken,  in ladies room people had thrown used sanitary pads,  so it was a real bad experience. The do provide costumes on payment both for men and women but people in the shirts baniyans and other dresses were also visible. Coming to pool and slides they have a good assortment but all if them do not function simultaneously.  I was there from 12 to 330 and the wave pool was not operative. Some youngsters with life guard t shirts are present.  But they were actually doing crowd management next to slides and blowing whistles.  The sitting area of the restaurant  was again dirty and unkempt.  Though tired we moved away from there quite fast. Go there if you are only in for pool and slides. Also the parking is not free. They do provide a small locker in the men's changing room. It can accomadate a small back pack.

Name: ShivaniK
Title: Jannat
Review: I love this ...place it's like jannat üòÄfor me becoz..we enjoyed a lot whenever we go each nd everything is good .. washroom are clean always..staff are very helpfull quick facilities provide delicious food... my fav water park ever is Anandi .thenkew Anandi nd his Teamüòç i'll come soon again

Name: Pawan_Shrotria
Title: Nice to hangout
Review: A good place to hangout but only in summer season.  There are sufficient number of rides.  Though tubes are too less.  Wave pool is operated ONLY on the days when there is crowd.  On our two visitsfrom 10-2 pm,  wave pool and water cascade were not operated.

Name: Abhineet
Title: Great in Summers
Review: get relieved in the scorching heat of April- June. good day out for the family. food is also OK and economical

Name: 592abck
Title: Just like any other water park
Review: Just like any other water park. Nothing special. There is no point going here if you don't have lot of time in your hand.

Name: vikashvikki2
Title: Vikas Trivedi
Review: This place is very nice i love it ..we enjoyed a lot .. all slide are working üòçüòçüòçüòç  i will suggest u this water park

Title: Not value for money.. food quality is worst.just u don't have options in Lucknow it's d only place..plz never suggest

Review: Good place to spend full day with ur family,friend.awesome wave,water dance,loud music cool dance,so many rides,they gave lunch included in tickets,tickets rate here are not too much,but in weekend tickets rates higher then others reguler days,i visited so many times,and also going tomorrow 28th june 2019 with my family yeeeeeeeeeeeeeee.

It is great place to go.

Review: Water park is very option for outing in summers, i went here with my friends, this water park is good but need to some upgrade.

Title: good one to have i pooll

Title: Water Park!
Review: It is a good waterpark near Indira canal, but sometimes few slides are not working properly. Otherwise its a good destination in summer to enjoy.

Name: Manvendra77
Title: Good water park

Title: masti package

Name: Sundeepgupta
Title: Full masti
Review: This may be a good day outing in summer. This place can be best enjoyed with friends and family. The water quality is good.

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: outing
Review: A water park for  amusement and fun for children as well as other family members. There is a provision for family party adjacent to the park

Name: satyaprakash375
Title: Anandi water park
Review: one of the best water park in  land on city of Nawab, lost of water slides and lots of funif u visited Lucknow pls visit Anandi water park.

Name: maddash-traveler
Title: Bad design, under staffed but good value
Review: This place is okay for adults or teenagers but is less than optimum for young kids. Why? Because the designers crammed dozens of rides in a small area. To reduce footprint, they eliminated the long flat landing Lane and instead made the landing zone for every slide deeper by ~1 feet. That makes it unsafe for smaller kids below 4 years. There is one life guard for every set of slides but on a busy day they can't literally catch all the small kids. My day was spent in catching my son as opposed to letting my 4 year old son enjoy on his own. The upkeep especially of the changing areas is a bit lacking in hygiene and could do with better standards. It's very 90s.The tube slides have tubes which are massively under inflated. The place is good value because the ticket includes clothes, lockers and a round of food. That leads to some mess since people keep going in and out of the water into the garden to eat and the water gets a bit muddied. There's a lazy river but there is no directional flow not tubes on which you can sit. Defeats the whole purpose. Lastly, the wave pool operates with limited frequency and at that time other rides are switched off. The waves are nice but the pool is gender segregated. My wife and mother in law enjoyed separately from us!I paid 1.5x the price in Gurgaon for Oysters but it is totally worth it!

Name: Ashish
Title: Pathetic water park
Review: Overly pricesVery bad foodBad condition of changing rooms and washroomPlease visit at your own risk.

Name: harshnegi
Title: A decent effort led down steeply by lack commitment to keep any standards
Review: With few options for kids around Lucknow (I mean monuments of historical importance is not an equivalent alternative), a water park is a logical options. The dept of the water is apt for kids, even my 2 years old can be comfortable, but it is dirty.There is no demaraction of area for children and dont think there is anyone to enforce it. The condition of change room not for discussion, but it is also dirty. They charge full tickets for kids more than 120 cms , measured on a board standing at the entrance (Rs 600) . They also force you to buy meal coupons to eat from inside.The Paw-Bhajji , Chowmein and some other option they give along with ice-cream (not sure which brand) and a small drink (200mL coke). We took Pav-Bajji and Chowmein and did not eat, wasted it(it tasted weird) (like others did before us).(A little effort could do into prepare the dish and can save some food wastage). Tips to have good time would be visit on working days, carry some food, your own towel, locker space given is really small so carry a polybag to keep your sandals/slippers, which is also a tip for foot wear.

Name: RBS2706
Title: Clearly not geared up for the big event
Review: This property is a water park, with about 50 rooms.  For a wedding in the family, we booked this place with almost all rooms occupied by the two sides.  However, it was clear from the very beginning that the property management team is not geared up for such a big occasion.  The rooms were extremely dusty.  Even after repeated reminders there were no one to clean the rooms.  We were there for 2 nights 3 days.  Since it was quite cold we did not try the water park.  However, best avoided.

Name: ravi p
Title: Pathetic Water Park, water is too dirty, rides are old and rusty
Review: I have visited this water park on 26 June 2014 with my wife, cousin and his wife. We thought of it a decent water park, with sub par facilities. But my experience is turned bad with the water quality and rides maintenance. I seriously do not advice this to families. Though its way too economical and budget friendly but no one love to take risks for price factor. This water park was way too better when it opened and few later years as I have visited this during my school days back in 2003. My suggestion skip this, there are far too many options available in Lucknow, check them out.
